pages.text: Through the raw potential of $(9)Rarity Materials$() and the versatility of $(9)Gem Dust$(), it is now possible to reforge an item with brand new affixes.$(p)Reforging is not limited to items that already have affixes, and can be performed with any valid item.
To begin reforging, craft a $(#5555FF)Simple Reforging Table$(), which allows you to reforge items up to $(#5555FF)Rare$() rarity.

pages.title: Input Slots
pages.text: The Reforging Table has three input slots.

pages.title: Input Slots
pages.text: The top slot holds the item you wish to reforge.$(p)The left slot accepts $(9)Rarity Materials$().$(p)The right slot is for Gem Dust.$(p)All slots must be filled for a successful reforging.

pages.title: Reforging
pages.text: Similar to an Enchanting Table, you get three choices.

pages.title: Reforging
pages.text: Each choice represents a potential new form of the item being reforged. The cost varies per choice, requiring 2/4/6 Gem Dust, Rarity Materials, and Experience Levels respectively.$(p)To reforge your item, simply click the desired choice.
To reforge items of $(#BB00BB)Epic$() rarity or higher, you'll need to upgrade your $(#5555FF)Simple Reforging Table$() into a $(#BB00BB)Reforging Table$().

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: Items can be reforged multiple times, but you must pick up and replace the item first.$(p)No choice is inherently stronger than the others.
